verses.verse: And when <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H87>Abram<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7706>him<s%>, I am the Almighty <S%H410>God<s%>; <S%H1980>walk<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>, and be <S%H8549>perfect<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between me and <S%H7235>you<s%>, and will multiply you <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%>.
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>him<s%>, saying,
As for <S%H589>me<s%>, <S%H1285>behold<s%>, my covenant is with <S%H1>you<s%>, and you shall be a father of <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Neither shall your <S%H8034>name<s%> any more be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>, but your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H85>Abraham<s%>; for a <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> have I made <S%H5414>you<s%>.
And I will <S%H6509>make<s%> you <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> of <S%H4428>you<s%>, and kings shall come out of <S%H3318>you<s%>.

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between me and you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you<s%> in their <S%H1755>generations<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, to be a <S%H430>God<s%> unto <S%H2233>you<s%>, and to your seed after <S%H310>you<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H2233>you<s%>, and to your seed after <S%H310>you<s%>, the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein you are a <S%H4033>stranger<s%>, all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%>; and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H2233>therefore<s%>, you, and your seed after <S%H310>you<s%> in their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

This is my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%>, between me and you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you<s%>; Every man <S%H2145>child<s%> among you shall be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>.
And you shall <S%H5243>circumcise<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H6190>foreskin<s%>; and it shall be a <S%H226>token<s%> of the covenant between me and <S%H1285>you<s%>.

And he that is <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> among <S%H2145>you<s%>, every man child in your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, he that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, or <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> of any <S%H1121>stranger<s%>, which is not of your <S%H2233>seed<s%>.

He that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and he that is <S%H4736>bought<s%> with your <S%H3701>money<s%>, must <S%H4135>needs<s%> be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>: and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall be in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> man <S%H2145>child<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> is not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people<s%>; he has <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, As for <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> your <S%H802>wife<s%>, you shall not <S%H7121>call<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall her name <S%H8034>be<s%>.

And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H5414>her<s%>, and give you a <S%H1121>son<s%> also of <S%H1288>her<s%>: Yes, I will bless <S%H1471>her<s%>, and she shall be a mother of nations; <S%H4428>kings<s%> of people shall be of <S%H5971>her<s%>.

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H6711>laughed<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, Shall a child be <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him that is a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>? And shall <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>, that is <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1323>old<s%>, <S%H3205>bear<s%>?
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, O <S%H3863>that<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> might <S%H2421>live<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>!

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> you a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H61>indeed<s%>; and you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>: and I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and with his <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%>.

And as for <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, I have heard <S%H8085>you<s%>: <S%H1288>Behold<s%>, I have blessed <S%H6509>him<s%>, and will make him fruitful, and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> him <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%>; <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> shall he <S%H3205>beget<s%>, and I will make <S%H5414>him<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>.

But my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will I <S%H6965>establish<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, which <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> to you at this set <S%H4150>time<s%> in the <S%H312>next<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>.
And he left <S%H3615>off<s%> <S%H1696>talking<s%> with <S%H430>him<s%>, and God went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H85>Abraham<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and all that were <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and all that were <S%H4736>bought<s%> with his <S%H3701>money<s%>, every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>; and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> in the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, as <S%H430>God<s%> had said to <S%H1696>him<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%>, when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%>.

And <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was <S%H6240>thirteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%>.
In the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>, and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And all the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H1121>stranger<s%>, were circumcised with <S%H4135>him<s%>.
